prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that has a bright red shell and white specks on its back.
I want a Pokemon with a unique mushroom-like cap and distinct orange claws.
Generate an insectoid Pokemon design featuring a stout body and an earthy color palette.
Make a Parasect-inspired creature that thrives in dark, damp forest environments.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines features of a crab and a mushroom with vibrant colors.
Design a Pokemon that has a strong connection to nature and can camouflage in its habitat.
Show me a Pokemon with a playful personality and a penchant for hiding in foliage.
